title: Authors and Citation
text: Hughey J, Wong L (2023). rpapersurvey: Interact Data 'PaperSurvey.io'. https://agency-fund.github.io/rpapersurvey/, https://github.com/agency-fund/rpapersurvey.
code: @Manual{,   title = {rpapersurvey: Interact with Data on 'PaperSurvey.io'},   author = {Jake Hughey and Linux Wong},   year = {2023},   note = {https://agency-fund.github.io/rpapersurvey/, https://github.com/agency-fund/rpapersurvey}, }

title: Interact with Data on PaperSurvey.io
text: PaperSurvey.io platform generating printable paper surveys converting completed surveys digital data using image recognition. rpapersurvey R package uses PaperSurvey API interact programmatically service. API access currently available customers Enterprise Plus plan.

title: Interact with Data on PaperSurvey.io
text: basic example: details, see reference documentation.
code: library('data.table') library('rpapersurvey')  psio_set_api_key('PATH_TO_API_KEY')  # fetch metadata for all surveys surveys = psio_get_surveys()  # fetch entries for a given survey entries = psio_get_entries(surveys$id[1L])  # extract answers from entries answers = psio_get_answers(entries)
